name: doc-detective-docker-image
description: Treat doc content as testable assertions to validate doc accuracy and product UX.

scripts.build-linux: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(jq -r .version package.json) && docker build -f ./linux.Dockerfile -t docdetective/docdetective:latest -t docdetective/docdetective:latest-linux -t docdetective/docdetective:linux -t docdetective/docdetective:$PACKAGE_VERSION -t docdetective/docdetective:$PACKAGE_VERSION-linux . --build-arg PACKAGE_VERSION=$PACKAGE_VERSION
scripts.build-linux-dev: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(jq -r .version package.json) && docker build -f ./linux.Dockerfile -t docdetective/docdetective:dev . --build-arg PACKAGE_VERSION=$PACKAGE_VERSION
scripts.push-linux: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(jq -r .version package.json) && docker push docdetective/docdetective:latest && docker push docdetective/docdetective:$PACKAGE_VERSION && docker push docdetective/docdetective:$PACKAGE_VERSION-linux
scripts.build-windows: set "DOCKER_BUILDKIT=0" && for /f "tokens=2 delims=:" %a in ('findstr /C:"version" package.json') do @set PACKAGE_VERSION=%a && set PACKAGE_VERSION=%PACKAGE_VERSION:~2,-2% && docker build -f ./windows.Dockerfile -t docdetective/docdetective:latest-windows -t docdetective/docdetective:%PACKAGE_VERSION%-windows -t docdetective/docdetective:windows . --build-arg PACKAGE_VERSION=%PACKAGE_VERSION%
scripts.build-windows-dev: set "DOCKER_BUILDKIT=0" && for /f "tokens=2 delims=:" %a in ('findstr /C:"version" package.json') do @set PACKAGE_VERSION=%a && set PACKAGE_VERSION=%PACKAGE_VERSION:~2,-2% && docker build -f ./windows.Dockerfile -t docdetective/docdetective:windows-dev . --build-arg PACKAGE_VERSION=%PACKAGE_VERSION%
scripts.push-windows: set "DOCKER_BUILDKIT=0" && for /f "tokens=2 delims=:" %a in ('findstr /C:"version" package.json') do @set PACKAGE_VERSION=%a && set PACKAGE_VERSION=%PACKAGE_VERSION:~2,-2% && docker push docdetective/docdetective:latest-windows && docker push docdetective/docdetective:windows

author: Manny Silva
